text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Halmstad Municipality | native_name = Halmstads kommun | native_name_lang = sv | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Halmstad city hall IMG 0146.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Halmstad City Hall | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Halmstad stora vapen.svg | shield_size = 120x80px | image_map = Halmstad Municipality in Halland County.png | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Sweden | subdivision_type1 = County | subdivision_name1 = Halland County | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Seat | seat = Halmstad | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = Area as of . | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = Province | blank_info_sec1 = Halland | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipal code | blank1_info_sec1 = 1380 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = SE | website = www.halmstad.se | footnotes = }} Halmstad Municipality (Halmstads kommun) is a municipality in Halland County on the Swedish west coast, in which the city Halmstad is the seat. The 1971 local government reform was implemented gradually in the area. In 1967 the rural municipality Simlångsdalen (created in 1952) was amalgamated into the City of Halmstad. The city was converted into a municipality of unitary type in 1971, but the seven surrounding municipalities were not merged into it until 1974. == Localities == There are 21 urban areas (also called a tätort or locality) in Halmstad Municipality. In the table the localities are listed according to the size of the population as of 31 December 2005. The municipal seat is in bold characters. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Locality !!
